topic.title: HPE Helion Managed Cloud with Helion OpenStack Documentation

body.p: HPE Helion Managed Cloud with Helion OpenStack provides a dedicated, single tenant, HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0-based managed private cloud, hosted in HPE data centers. This enterprise grade, rapidly-provisioned private cloud service is available to customers in an OpEx model. HPE Helion OpenStack provides an open source and highly-configurable infrastructure as a service (IaaS). The optional HPE Helion Development Platform gives developers a powerful set of tools to migrate traditional applications, build cloud native applications, and deploy both to an open and integrated platform as a service (PaaS) layer.
This content set contains information about the following products:

strow.stentry: HPEâ€™s enterprise-grade distribution of OpenStack software. This hardened, extensible product is designed to deliver leading open-source cloud computing while adhering tightly to OpenStack software API standards and services.

stentry.p: A PaaS based on Cloud Foundry technology and fully integrated with HPE Helion OpenStack. This product helps developers build cloud-native applications and then deploy across private and public clouds.
